item.title: About
item.description: I have been writing code from my college days and been doing it for a living sice 2015. I really enjoy working in the startup environment and currently working as Technical Consultant at TarkaLabs. I love building/breaking and building stuff again (although preferably not in prod). For the past 1 year have been working fully remote and enjoying it very much. Currently learning to pick up the functional way getting things done.
